column1: Uchi////Simply the best sushi I've ever had.  I don't think I will ever find better.  The atmosphere is also top-notch.  The wait staff explains each dish to you as they bring out your food.  Each dish is a special combination of flavors.  Yes
column2: you will pay a lot of money
column3: but in this case it is worth it.  You can also try it for happy hour where the prices are much cheaper.  You might have to reserve your table a week in advance.
